group_1.textRight: So where are we delivering these?@To Su-tan’s place?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, considering what went on the other day,@we should pay Puella Care a visit.

group_1.textRight: Yay!

group_1.textLeft: After that…there’s also the girls from@Mikazuki Villa…

group_1.textRight: You made friends with them, huh…@…[chara:113702:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:113702:motion_000][chara:113702:cheek_0][chara:113702:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:113702:lipSynch_1]Oh!
In that case, Nayutan, can we stop by my@sister’s place first?

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me.

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, too! Sis!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Nayuta and Mii, welcome~
Huh... Oh, and who are these adorable@little witches?
Are you perhaps Mitama's little sister...?

group_1.textRight: Yep! Sis' sister is Mii!

group_1.textLeft: I heard all about you from the Counseling@Room girls.
It’s very nice to meet you.

group_1.textRight: Nice to meet you too!

group_1.textLeft: Your greeting was full of energy,@I like that.

group_1.textRight: Greeting people with all you’ve got is how it@should be! It’s what my teacher says.

group_1.textLeft: My, taking your teacher’s guidance to heart!@What a good girl you are, Mii.

group_1.textRight: Yeah! Mii is a good girl!
That’s incredible…Maria…@You’ve already gotten so familiar…

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*@Thank you, Konomi.
…Umm, and…who is this?

group_1.textRight: Oh, my name is Nayuta Satomi.
I moved here from Takarazaki City not@long ago.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you’re Touka’s cousin, right?@I've heard about you.
Though, I didn’t know you came from the@same city as Iroha.
It’s good to have you here.

group_1.textRight: Yes, thank you very much.

group_1.textLeft: Welcome!

group_1.textRight: There’s also my servant and housemate,@Rabi. She’s also a Magical Girl.
If you happen to meet her,@please treat her well.

group_1.textLeft: Rabi...?
Don’t tell me, the one the lady from my@job mentioned…
The Rabi Himuro who's the talk of the town@around the shopping districts…?

group_1.textRight: Oh, so you already knew of her?

group_1.textLeft: It’s getting pretty lively here.
But about that big bag you brought…
I’m assuming you didn’t come here just for@Coordination and chatting, did you?

group_1.textRight: Course not.
You see, we’re pretending to be Befana today!

group_1.textLeft: Befana...?
It’s an Italian Christmas legend.
It says that the sorceress Befana visits kids@who’ve been good and gives them treats.

group_1.textRight: That’s right!@That sorceress Befana!
So Mii and Nayuta made some treats to give@to everyone.
Here, Sis!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Thank you.

group_1.textRight: Here, you too,@Maria and Konomi.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, can we really?@But we just met today...
You couldn't have had enough proportions@for us too, right?

group_1.textRight: Don't worry.
We intended to gift them to a lot of people,@with no one in particular in mind.
So we're really just giving them to whoever@we happen to meet!
So here, you can take it!

group_1.textLeft: Well then, I’ll gladly accept it.

group_1.textRight: Is it good, Sis?

group_1.textLeft: …Yes, it's delicious.

group_1.textRight: (When I came to the Coordinator's shop today,)
(I never expected that I'd get to eat sweets@this delicious.)

group_1.textLeft: This is on par with the ones from bakeries.

group_1.textRight: Really?! Yay!

group_1.textLeft: The tulips made out of cream also look lovely.

group_1.textRight: I'm particularly proud of those.

group_1.textLeft: Mii, when did you get so skilled at this?
You never really made anything besides some@basic food, right…?

group_1.textRight: It was Rabitan that taught me lots of stuff!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, is that so?

group_1.textRight: Even though we decided to hand out@sweets so suddenly today...
She helped us with everything from picking@ingredients to preparing the treats.
Without Rabitan, it would've never turned@out this good!

group_1.textLeft: She sure sounds like a flawless servant.

group_1.textRight: Indeed, she is.
Not just today, but she’s always there@to lend me a hand.

group_1.textLeft: She sounds very kind as well…

group_1.textRight: Huh…[chara:113701:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:113701:cheek_0][chara:113701:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:113701:lipSynch_1]does she...?
I went through quite the shameful ordeal@today because of her…
So y’know, Sis, I wanted to talk to you@about something...
Is it okay for us to give sweets to the@Union girls if we see them?

group_1.textLeft: …So that’s what it was.@Well, you put a lot of effort into these.
I can’t just not let you do it.

group_1.textRight: [chara:113702:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yay!
You're really good at convincing people,@Mikage.

group_1.textLeft: Now that the main topic has been@settled...

group_1.textRight: We should give our thanks for the@sweets once more.

group_1.textCenter: Thank you for gifting us these sweets!

group_1.textLeft: Of course, you’re very welcome.
